text:
The Curry Culture – Cuppage

I recently visited The Curry Culture at Cuppage on a Wednesday. The ambience was very pleasant and welcoming, giving off positive vibes right from the moment I entered. It wasn’t crowded at all—only two other groups were there—making it a peaceful and relaxing experience.

The food was good and the service was excellent. The staff were attentive and polite, which really added to the overall experience.

Prices are on the higher side, but that’s expected for a place like this in Cuppage, where the setting and experience justify the premium.

A great spot if you’re looking for a chill evening with good food.

It was delish!!! Yummyy!! The chicken biryani has the right mix of flavors it’s not too spicy, just right! The butter chicken plus the garlic and cheese pratha super good! I love love everything that we ate here. Such a good find! Will definitely come back here :)

We stumbled upon this place during a random walk on the first day of our trip in Singapore.  I'm glad I found this place. Food is really good and staffs are very welcoming.. During our entire trip , we had our dinner here and sometimes lunch too. They made us feel at home. I definitely recommend this place to anyone who wants try out authentic Indian food.

Amazing food. Even better service. Jimmy and Shubahm were incredible hosts, so friendl. Finally our search for a new regular northern Indian restaurant has come to an end. One of the few places that could scratch our vindaloo itch. Naan was wonderful too. Nuff said, highly recommend!
This is the place to go if you are looking for top notch curries. Everything we had was wonderful! The Curry Culture is our go-to Indian restaurant now, and the staff are lovely as well.
